text: Anklam is a town in the German state of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern. About 12,000 people live there. It is on the river Peene. Anklam was the capital of Ostvorpommern. Since September 2011, it became part of Vorpommern-Greifswald. == References == == Other websites == * Official website
title: Anklam
